## R Markdown

## This is my level 1 heading

### This is my level 2 heading

#### This is my level 3 heading

##### This is my level 4 heading

This is my main text: POLI3148 is cool.

## Add code to your document

```{r}
log(50)
```

```{r}
1+1

```

## Output Figures

```{r}
plot(1:10,1:10)
```

## Display Data

```{r}
cars
```
